compatibility.notes: The PHP-3.01 license is permissive and allows for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses such as the GPL and LGPL.

key_requirements: Must retain copyright notice and conditions in source code redistributions.
Must reproduce copyright notice and conditions in binary redistributions.
Must not use 'PHP' in product names without permission.
Must include acknowledgment of PHP software in all redistributions.
license.name: PHP-3.01
obligations: Retain copyright notice and list of conditions in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright notice and list of conditions in documentation for binary redistributions.
Obtain prior written permission to use the name 'PHP' for endorsement or promotion.
Obtain prior written permission to use 'PHP' in the name of derived products.
Include acknowledgment of PHP software in redistributions.
